main event: On June 17, 1966, two witnesses observed a large object with red blinking lights while traveling northwest in Indiana.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be about 30 feet in diameter and hovered 30 feet above the ground., One observer reported seeing a wing on the object., The object followed the witnesses' car for about two miles before disappearing behind trees., A low-flying airplane was seen shortly after the sighting, possibly searching for the object., Witnesses described the object as brilliantly lighted and silent.
sighted object: a large object with red blinking lights
witness description: Two civilian witnesses traveling in a car
